diff_user.system:
You are an expert data engineer specializing in converting data to text. Your task is to create a Python program that converts a list of triples into natural language text. The given triples will be associated with the topic: Athlete. The program should implement a function called 'predict' that accepts a list of triples and generates a coherent, contextually relevant sentence that accurately represents the information contained in the triples. Ensure that the generated text is fluent, grammatically correct, and maintains the meaning of the original data. There can be multiple triples given that make up a complex sentence. Converting all those triples into one sentence will award greater score. An example of a complex sentence:
Triples:
(Antwerp | cityServed | Antwerp International Airport)
(Belgium | country | Antwerp)
(City of Brussels | capital | Belgium)
Example sentence:
"Antwerp International Airport serves the city of Antwerp which is in Belgium, where the capital is Brussels."

The 'predict' function returns that sentence as a string. Below is the list of all possible predicates that can be given as an input. With the given predicates and example triples implement the 'predict' function so it can process all the possible predicates:

Predicate: league - Example triple: (A.C. Milan | league | Serie A)
Predicate: manager - Example triple: (A.C. Milan | manager | Siniša Mihajlović)
Predicate: position - Example triple: (A.S. Roma | position | Serie A)
Predicate: ground - Example triple: (AZ Alkmaar | ground | AFAS Stadion)
Predicate: birthDate - Example triple: (Aaron Boogaard | birthDate | 1986-08-11)
Predicate: birthPlace - Example triple: (Aaron Boogaard | birthPlace | Regina, Saskatchewan)
Predicate: birthYear - Example triple: (Aaron Boogaard | birthYear | 1986)
Predicate: club - Example triple: (Aaron Boogaard | club | Wichita Thunder)
Predicate: draftTeam - Example triple: (Aaron Boogaard | draftTeam | Minnesota Wild)
Predicate: height - Example triple: (Aaron Boogaard | height | 1.905)
Predicate: youthclub - Example triple: (Aaron Hunt | youthclub | Goslarer SC 08)
Predicate: currentclub - Example triple: (Abner (footballer) | currentclub | Real Madrid Castilla)
Predicate: weight - Example triple: (Adam McQuaid | weight | 94.8024 (kilograms))
Predicate: deathPlace - Example triple: (Akeem Adams | deathPlace | Budapest)
Predicate: activeYearsStartYear - Example triple: (Akeem Ayers | activeYearsStartYear | 2011)
Predicate: currentteam - Example triple: (Akeem Ayers | currentteam | "Los Angeles Rams")
Predicate: debutTeam - Example triple: (Akeem Ayers | debutTeam | Tennessee Titans)
Predicate: draftPick - Example triple: (Akeem Ayers | draftPick | "39")
Predicate: draftRound - Example triple: (Akeem Ayers | draftRound | "2")
Predicate: formerTeam - Example triple: (Akeem Ayers | formerTeam | Los Angeles Rams)
Predicate: playerNumber - Example triple: (Akeem Dent | playerNumber | "50")
Predicate: college - Example triple: (Alex Tyus | college | Florida Gators men's basketball)
Predicate: draftYear - Example triple: (Alex Tyus | draftYear | 2011)
Predicate: coach - Example triple: (Anadolu Efes S.K. | coach | Dušan Ivković)
Predicate: owner - Example triple: (Atlanta Falcons | owner | Arthur Blank)
Predicate: city - Example triple: (Boston Bruins | city | Boston)
Predicate: leader - Example triple: (Brandon, Manitoba | leader | Conservative Party of Canada)
Predicate: anthem - Example triple: (Canada | anthem | O Canada)
Predicate: ethnicGroup - Example triple: (Canada | ethnicGroup | Asian Canadians)
Predicate: language - Example triple: (Canada | language | French language)
Predicate: generalManager - Example triple: (Columbus Blue Jackets | generalManager | Jarmo Kekäläinen)
Predicate: chairman - Example triple: (FC Spartak Moscow | chairman | Sergey Rodionov)
Predicate: season - Example triple: (FC Torpedo Moscow | season | 2014–15 Russian Premier League)
Predicate: currency - Example triple: (Finland | currency | Euro)
Predicate: demonym - Example triple: (Finland | demonym | Finns)
Predicate: officialLanguage - Example triple: (Finland | officialLanguage | Finnish language)
Predicate: stadium - Example triple: (Jacksonville Dolphins | stadium | John Sessions Stadium)
Predicate: universityTeam - Example triple: (Jacksonville Dolphins | universityTeam | Jacksonville University)
Predicate: mostChampions - Example triple: (National Hockey League | mostChampions | Montreal Canadiens)
Predicate: leaderTitle - Example triple: (Regina, Saskatchewan | leaderTitle | Legislative Assembly of Saskatchewan)
Predicate: isPartOf - Example triple: (St. Louis | isPartOf | French First Republic)
Predicate: country - Example triple: (Budapest | country | Hungary)
Predicate: utcOffset - Example triple: (Gdynia, Poland | utcOffset | +2)
Predicate: timeZone - Example triple: (Gdynia, Poland | timeZone | Central European Summer Time)
Predicate: areaTotal - Example triple: (Gdynia, Poland | areaTotal | 135000000.0)
Predicate: foundingDate - Example triple: (Gdynia, Poland | foundingDate | 1926-02-10)
